about.about-openspace-description: OpenSpace is open-source interactive data visualization software designed to visualize the entire known universe and portray our ongoing efforts to investigate the cosmos.

drag-reorder-list.drag-handle-aria-label: Move item up or down (keyboard control not supported)

error-fallback.alert-title: ðŸš¨ Houston, we have a problem...ðŸš¨
error-fallback.alert-text: An error with the following message was thrown:

search-results.empty-results: No results found. Try another search!

search-settings-menu.no-selection-tooltip: Nothing is selected. Search will be empty.

info.heading: Friction controls
info.description: Enable or disable rotation, zoom, and roll friction. If checked, applies friction to camera movement.

jump.title: Jump to
jump.tooltip: Teleport to object using a fade transition

jump-geo.title: Jump to Geo
jump-geo.tooltip: Teleport to position using a fade transition

focus.title: Focus
focus.tooltip: Focus the object (set as anchor). Hold <0>Shift</0> when clicking to focus without retargeting

fly.title: Fly to
fly.tooltip: Trigger a flight to the object. Hold <0>Shift</0> when clicking to instantly teleport/jump

fly-geo.title: Fly to Geo
fly-geo.tooltip: Trigger a flight to the position. Hold <0>Shift</0> when clicking to instantly teleport/jump

frame.title: Zoom to / Frame
frame.tooltip: Frame the object by moving the camera in a straigt line and rotate towards it. Hold <0>Shift</0> when clicking to do it instantaneously

property-label.read-only-tooltip: This property is read-only, meaning that it's not intended to be changed.

confirmation-modal.title: Confirm Change
confirmation-modal.description: You are about to change the value of '{{propertyName}}'. This property is marked as sensitive and requires confirmation. Do you want to proceed?
